reviewText: Dymo's website has a software download for Intel power Macs - this software does not work at all - even though the Mac "sees" the Dymo sitting on a USB port it cannot print to it - after a friendly geek struggled with it for the better part of a hour it finally decided to print labels - even the geek does not know what he did to make it print - so - if it goes down - it goes to my physical trash bin - get with it DYMO - Macs are taking over the computer world
summary: Intel Powered Mac? - forget Dymo printers
